title: Ask HN: What are the best websites that the Anglosphere doesn't know about?
author: remolacha
story_text: What unique or high-quality content only exists outside the English-speaking web? Is there a Chinese equivalent to Hacker News? A Hindi StackOverflow? I would love to broaden my horizons :)

title.value: Ask HN: What are the best websites that the Anglosphere doesn't know about?
